ParameterString.description: Flag: ACAS Aircraft identification capability? (Y/N) [I048/230 AIC]
Altitude reporting capability, currently 25 or 100, replaces old ACAS_25FT_REPORTING column
ACAS Communications capability of the transponder, see X__SD_ACAS_COMMS [I048/230 COM]
ACAS Flight status, see X__SD_ACAS_FLIGHT_STATUS [I048/230 STAT]
Flag: ACAS Mode-S specifific service capability? (Y/N) [I048/230 MMSC]
Antenna 1 or 2
Calculated Geographical Altitude
aircraft identification when flight plan is available or the plan is available [I021/170, I048/240]
ASTERIX Category
0 = default, 5 = code 7500 (unlawful interference), 6 = code 7600 (radio comunnication failure), 7 = code 7700 (emergency) [I001/020 DS1/DS2]
Detection type [I030/080 TYPE, I062/340 #6 TYP], see X__SD_DETECTION_TYPES
Day of message in posix time.
DATA SOURCE ID, is derived from table DS and its sub tables
Flag: Y = from Fixed Field Transponder, N = from Aircraft [I001/020 RAB, , I021/040 RAB, I048/020 RAB]
Geographical area bit mask
ARTAS MD5 Hash Code
Height in Ft measured by a 3D radar [048/110]
Non-ASTERIX source id
COMMUNICATION LINE ID determines the origin of the record, see table COMMS
Flag: military emergency? (Y/N) [I001/020 MI, I048/020 ME]
Flag: Y = military, N = default [I001/020 MI, I048/020 MI, I062/080 MI]
Mode-1 Code in octal representation [I001/055, I048/055]
Mode-1 garbled? (Y,N) [I001/055 G, I048/055 G]
Mode-1 Confidence indicator, 6 bits, each bit indicating low quality if it is 1, NULL is the same 0 (all bits have high quality) [I001/065 QXi, I048/065 QXi]
Flag: Y = Mode-1 is smoothed, N = Mode-1 as derived from the reply of the transponder [I001/055 L, I048/055 L]
Mode-2 Code in octal representation [I001/050, I048/050]
Mode-2 garbled? (Y,N) [I001/050 G, I048/050 G]
Mode-2 Confidence indicator, 12 bits, each bit indicating low quality if it is 1, NULL is the same 0 (all bits have high quality) [I001/060 QXi, I048/050 QXi]
Flag: Y = Mode-2 is smoothed, N = Mode-2 as derived from the reply of the transponder [I001/050 L, I048/050 L]
Mode-3/A Code in octal representation [I001/070, I048/070]
Mode-3/A garbled? (Y,N) [I001/070 G, I048/070 G]
Mode-3/A Confidence indicator, 12 bits, each bit indicating low quality if it is 1, NULL is the same 0 (all bits have high quality) [I001/080 QXi, I048/080 QXi]
Flag: Y = Mode-3/A is smoothed, i.e. not extracted during last scan, N = Mode-3/A as derived from the reply of the transponder [I001/070 L, I048/070 L]
Mode-3/A valid? (Y,N) [I001/070 V, I048/070 V]
Mode-4 interrorgation type: - = no interrogation, F = Friendly target, U = Unknown Target, N = No Reply [I048/020 FOE/FRI]
Mode-C Code Flight Level in Ft [I001/090, I048/090]
Mode-C Code as received from the transponder [I001/100, I048/100]
Mode-C garbled? (Y,N) [I001/090 G, I048/090 G]
Mode-C garbled? (Y,N) [I001/100 G, I048/100 G]
Mode-C Confidence indicator, 12 bits, each bit indicating low quality if it is 1, NULL is the same 0 (all bits have high quality) [I001/060 QXi, I048/050 QXi]
Mode-C valid? (Y,N) [I001/090 V, I048/090 V]
Mode-C valid? (Y,N) [I001/100 V, I048/100 V]
Raw Mode S MB Data (= BDS registers)
Protocol type as defined in X__SD_MSG_FMTS, contents shall be ASTERIX, Aircat 500, Alenia, FPS117, RAT31SL, RSRP, TRS22, RDIF, MADREC, EUROCONTROL, DDE, CD2, Ericsson
Amplitude of (M)SSR reply in dBm [048/130 #3 SAM]
Number of received replies from (M)SSR [048/130 #2 SRR]
Measured position in polar coordinates: Theta in ¿¿ [I001/040, I048/040]
C = computed, R = reported
WGS84 coordinate latitude
Calculated x position in Cartesian coordinates [I001/042, I048/042]
C = computed, R = reported
Calculated y position in Cartesian coordinates [I001/042, I048/042]
C = computed, R = reported
WGS84 coordinate longitude
Measured position in polar coordinates: Rho in NM [I001/040, I048/040]
C = computed, R = reported
System coordinate x
System coordinate y
Amplitude of primary plot in dBm [048/130 #5 PAM]
Primary plot runlength in ¿¿ [048/130 #4 PRL]
Difference in azimuth between PSR and SSR plot in NM [048/130 #6 RDP]
Difference in range between PSR and SSR plot in NM [048/130 #6 RDP]
Binary representation
Report from which RDP Chain number: 1 or 2 [I001/020 RDP, I048/020 RDP]
Unique record id starting with 0 on every new recording
ms fraction of REC_TIME_POSIX
Recording time with accuracy of 1s; is stamped by the communication process
Report classification [I001/020, I048/020, etc] as enrichment, see X__SD_REPORT_TYPES
Scan number
ASTERIX System Identification Code [I001/010, I002/010, I002/010, I034/010, I048/010, I062/010, I021/010]
Flag: Y = Simulated, N = actual plot/track (I001/020 SIM, I021/040 SIM, I048/020 SIM]
Flag: Special position indication? (Y/N) [I001/020 SPI, I021/040 SPI, , I048/020 SPI]
SSR plot runlength in degree [048/130 #1 SRL]
24 bit target addreess / aircraft address / Mode-S address assigned uniquely to each aircraft [I021/080, I048/220]
Flag: Y = Test target report, N = Real target report (I001/020 TST, I021/040 TST, I048/020 TST]
Measured time / (truncated) Time of Day (= ms since last midnight), [I001/141, I021/030, I048/140]
C:Calculated, R:Recording time, N:From data, L:Local time transform
Climb/Descend Mode: M = Maintaining, C = Climbing, D = Descending, I = Invalid [I048/170 CDM]
Flag: Track confirmed? [I001/170 CON, I048/170 CNF]
Flag: Plot to Track association doubtful? [I001/170 DOU, I048/170 DOU]
Flag: End of Track? [I001/170 TRE, I048/170 TRE]
Flag: Y = Ghost Target, N = True Target [I001/170 GHO, I048/170 GHO]
Calculated track velocity expressed in polar coordinates, groundspeed in Kt [I001/200, I021/160, I048/200]
Calculated track velocity expressed in polar coordinates, angle in ¿¿ [I001/200, I021/160, I048/200]
Flag: Horizontal manoeuvring? [I001/170 MAN, I048/170 MAN]
Track number, can also be plot number for CAT 001
RDP Chain 1 or 2 [I001/170 RDPC]
Standard deviation on the angle within the local grid system [I048/210 Sigma(H)]]
Standard deviation on the groundspeed within the local grid system [I048/210 Sigma(V)]]
Standard deviation on the horizontal axis of the local grid system [I048/210 Sigma(X)]]
Standard deviation on the vertical axis of the local grid system [I048/210 Sigma(Y)]]
Type of plot coordinate transformation mechanism in slant range correction technique? [I048/170 TCC]
Flag: Track maintained with track information from neighbouring Node B on the cluster, or network? [I048/170 SUP]
P (Primary), S(SSR), C(Combined), N(Not primary, SSR/Combined), I(Invalid)
